info.name: Gmail - better coloured buttons
info.description: Gmails buttons are all visually identical, which makes it too easy to hit the wrong one. Frustrated by the number of times I hit the SPAM -button rather than the DELETE-button as intended, I made this Userstyle-script to make the buttons easier to distinguish.
info.additionalInfo:
C H A N G E L O G
-----------------
08.01.2014 | v1.0: Initial release
10.01.2014 | v1.1: Further added space around the spam button (and repositioned elements a bit)
